body:
Ok this post may sound/look pointless but bear with my idea.

This Thread is basically a thread where anyone can ask anyone anything they have in mind, it can be serious, in mind for a while, random, or for banters.

(Also doing this cuz im getting bored and i want to go on the forums every few minutes xD)

Example. @Posighdun (Posi/Sessp) Since when did you get telstra to work for you recently? :^)
